-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Automated Mutation Testing for HUnit tests
--   
--   This package contains the test adapter for HUnit tests to use it with
--   MuCheck
@package MuCheck-HUnit
@version 0.3.0.4


-- | Module for using HUnit tests
module Test.MuCheck.TestAdapter.HUnit
type HUnitSummary = Counts

-- | Summarizable instance of <tt>HUnitSumary</tt>
instance Typeable Counts
instance Summarizable HUnitSummary
